name: The Ultimate RNG Platformer Role Playing Game
name_original: The Ultimate RNG Platformer Role Playing Game
description:
It's a platformer! It's an RPG! Pick your character! Pick your class! And get ready to run your pixelated butt off. Will you survive the Great Earthquake and Slime Plague? Try to run as far as you can, while playing on 100% randomly generated worlds!

Controls:

A + D to move

Space / W to jump

Left Click to swing your weapon

(The Ultimate RNG Platformer Role Playing Game was made in 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam 2020. Have fun, and good luck!)
